 41 | 
 42 | ## Merge delivers the data — so you can build AI faster
 43 | 
 44 | Join our Merge x AI: Demo Day to hear how leading product teams use Merge to securely build AI features with complete data control — and what agentic actions are unlocked with Merge MCP.
 45 | 
 46 | And we’re not stopping there — you’ll get a rundown of what else we’ve shipped and an early look at what’s coming soon!
 47 | 
 48 | [Register now\\
 49 | \\
 50 | Arrow Right](https://www.merge.dev/merge-x-ai-demo-day#) [Get access\\

 53 | 
 54 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/682aef0d0f20082489adbcd8_webinar_sec2.avif)
 55 | 
 56 | ## Inside Merge x AI: Demo Day —  what you’ll learn
 57 | 
 58 | Chapter 1
 59 | 
 60 | #### Build AI with data control at its core
 61 | 
 62 | Chapter 2
 63 | 
 64 | #### Sync file data at scale
 65 | 
 66 | Chapter 3
 67 | 
 68 | #### Turn prompts into real actions with Merge MCP
 69 | 
 70 | Chapter 4
 71 | 
 72 | #### …and everything else we’ve shipped, too!
 73 | 
 74 | Chapter 1
 75 | 
 76 | ### Build AI with data control at its core
 77 | 
 78 | Learn how ACLs, scopes, and auth levels give you full control over who can access what data. Watch how Ema uses Merge’s cross-category integrations to power their Universal AI employee — and why data access is critical to their use case.
 79 | 
 80 | Chapter 2
 81 | 
 82 | ### Sync file data at scale
 83 | 
 84 | File data is foundational for AI-powered search. That’s why we’ve enhanced sync speed, improved File Picker, and scaled our infrastructure for enterprise needs across our file storage integrations. And we’ll be announcing a brand new integration category crucial for this use case.
 85 | 
 86 | Chapter 3
 87 | 
 88 | ### Turn prompts into real actions with Merge MCP
 89 | 
 90 | See how Merge’s Model Context Protocol (MCP) connects LLMs to third-party platforms — enabling agents to take actions. We’ll highlight key use cases, demo MCP live, and preview how we’re evolving this feature in the coming months.
 91 | 
 92 | Chapter 4
 93 | 
 94 | ### …and everything else we’ve shipped, too!
 95 | 
 96 | Alongside everything we’ve launched for enterprise search, AI agents, and knowledge tools, we’ve shipped major updates to the Merge dashboard, Merge Link, and other integration categories — all to make secure data access easy. We’ll show you what’s been added and what it unlocks.
 97 | 
 98 | ## Who you’ll hear from
 99 | 
100 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62796ab9647626cbab663f42/682eca8697bd1f73b4d538d3_Abe%20Chen-%20Merge.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62796ab9647626cbab663f42/67dc2621426b154e3ef25b5b_Abe.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/652f0ae004bd476a275ed3ec_avatar-placeholder.svg)
101 | 
102 | Abe Chen
103 |

 28 | Security and privacy
 29 | 
 30 | # Security and compliance are at our core
 31 | 
 32 | Merge is designed from the ground up to safeguard your customer data in accordance with the industry’s highest standards of security and privacy
 33 | 
 34 | [Merge Trust Center](https://trust.merge.dev/) [Get a demo\\
 35 | \\
 36 | Arrow Right](https://www.merge.dev/archive/get-in-touch?utm_btn=dr-page-security)
 37 | 
 38 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67c300aebb53c73e283d6ca9_security%20hero.svg)
 39 | 
 40 | Security and privacy
 41 | 
 42 | ## Delivering world-class security and privacy standards
 43 | 
 44 | At Merge, data protection is top priority — and has been from the very beginning. It’s why we protect your data with trusted infrastructure, rigorous auditing, and best-in-class certifications.
 45 | 
 46 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67c303c928794a3ca786c07f_clock-rotate-left.svg)
 47 | 
 48 | ### Uptime
 49 | 
 50 | Fault-tolerant infrastructure ensures availability even during extreme demand
 51 | 
 52 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67c303c9a94e7f9dc8962ec2_file-lock.svg)
 53 | 
 54 | ### Encryption
 55 | 
 56 | Data is encrypted at rest and in transit, and PII is protected with an additional layer of application encryption
 57 | 
 58 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67c04944d87e93bd2f8f977f_database.svg)
 59 | 
 60 | ### Data centers
 61 | 
 62 | All data is secured in Amazon Web Services (AWS) data centers with enterprise-grade physical and network security
 63 | 
 64 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67c306d7f50ee862786c5401_AiCPA%20American%20Institute%20of%20Certified%20Public%20Accountants%201.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67c306d7a90efda00a6324df_ISOlogo%201.png)
 65 | 
 66 | ### Compliance frameworks
 67 | 
 68 | Merge adheres to industry-standard compliance frameworks, including SOC 2 Type II, ISO 27001, HIPAA, GDPR, and CCPA
 69 | 
 70 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67c306d70d976f32675e9505_image%203.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67c306d72ed0fdbc55da8b9d_Frame%202945.png)
 71 | 
 72 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67c3052139c3df1f407c898e_shield-check.svg)
 73 | 
 74 | ### Defense in depth
 75 | 
 76 | All data is secured in Amazon Web Services (AWS) data centers with enterprise-grade physical and network security
 77 | 
 78 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67c305215c78a99c96841460_user-shield.svg)
 79 | 
 80 | ### Shift left
 81 | 
 82 | Our developers are proactive when it comes to security and use both DAST and SAST security scanning tools
 83 | 
 84 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67c30522fdfd613a8b585717_penetration%20testing.svg)
 85 | 
 86 | ### Penetration testing
 87 | 
 88 | Our security team conducts penetration testing every year and automated scans on a weekly basis
 89 | 
 90 | Enterprise-level security & privacy
 91 | 
 92 | ## Designed with your security needs in mind
 93 | 
 94 | Merge is built with features to meet and exceed your enterprise security and privacy needs
 95 | 
 96 | [**Data residency and transfer**](https://www.merge.dev/security#data-transfer) [Data minimization](https://www.merge.dev/security#data-minimization) [Data access and erasure](https://www.merge.dev/security#data-access) [Accountability and compliance](https://www.merge.dev/security#accountability) [Additional resources](https://www.merge.dev/security#additional-resources)
 97 | 
 98 | #### **Data residency and transfer**
 99 | 
100 | Confidently meet data residency requirements
101 | 
102 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67b9e5a942959918e094ba51_Frame%202087327457.png)
103 | 
104 | ##### Multi-tenants

 44 | ### Merge is G2’s leading Unified API platform, and your long-term, secure integration partner
 45 | 
 46 | At a tenth of Merge’s size, Apideck lacks the resources needed to support you, your integrations, and your customers. From implementation to adoption, Merge is a partnership that prioritizes customer support and success. Our 100+ G2 reviews from extremely satisfied customers speak for itself.

 52 | ### Apideck does not pre-fetch data, which leads to unpredictable and inconsistent data syncs
 53 | 
 54 | Apideck’s Unified API only accesses data when an API call is made, leading to unreliable syncs due to third-party provider rate limits and data structures. Merge’s secure infrastructure and storing of data means instant data access with consistent, reliable syncs.

 56 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67b5d5f02c3b46017f5a667f_apideck_2.svg)

 63 | 
 64 | Merge switched from API call pricing to a flat rate per connection, offering more transparent and predictable pricing model that aligns with your business needs.

 28 | Merge vs. Codat
 29 | 
 30 | # Merge is your long-term partner to power your accounting integrations
 31 | 
 32 | ‍
 33 | 
 34 | - Codat is deprioritizing their accounting Unified API; Merge is constantly adding accounting integrations and capabilities
 35 | - Codat doesn’t allow you to access custom data; Merge provides full flexibility and extensibility
 36 | - Codat’s async POST requests delay data reconciliation and are error-prone, while Merge syncs instantly when you write data
 37 | 
 38 | [Get a demo](https://www.merge.dev/get-in-touch?utm_btn=dr-page-vs%2Fcodat)
 39 | 
 40 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67adbc2b6979f65a411865f4_6bc233d732aef0c9f8273f2d5438befd_about_hero_bg-min.png)
 41 | 
 42 | ## 01
 43 | 
 44 | ### With regular product updates, Merge provides trusted, high-quality accounting integrations
 45 | 
 46 | Codat has completely stopped investing in their accounting integrations to focus on other parts of their business. They’ve already deprecated endpoints that support key accounting use cases.
 47 | 
 48 | Merge is committed to enhancing and developing new accounting integrations and capabilities. In addition to our product investments, Merge leads the market in customer satisfaction, support, and implementation.
 49 | 
 50 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67b5d540e9d433286bb39700_apideck_1.svg)
 51 | 
 52 | ## 02
 53 | 
 54 | ### Merge supports your custom data needs, offering complete data flexibility and extensibility
 55 | 
 56 | Anything that’s possible by building natively is possible through Merge. Access any custom accounting objects and fields beyond Merge’s Common Models.
 57 | 
 58 | Codat does not support passthrough data, limiting what data you can access outside of their defined Common Models.
 59 | 
 60 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67b6f8be9d595b040b20561d_codat-2.svg)
 61 | 
 62 | ## 03
 63 | 
 64 | ### POST data without the lag – Merge processes your requests immediately
 65 | 
 66 | Codat batches POST requests async, meaning delays when writing data to your customers’ accounting platform. These async calls are extremely error-prone, requiring idempotency and heavy infrastructure builds to determine if writes succeed.
 67 | 
 68 | Merge's architecture is fundamentally different, with immediate syncs, where possible, when writing data. Merge is built for real-time use cases, never waiting to process your POST requests.
 69 | 
 70 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67b6fa309696a99aeeea49f9_codat-3.svg)

 28 | Merge vs. Embedded iPaaS
 29 | 
 30 | # The Unified API for customizability
 31 | 
 32 | Merge is a Unified API for customer-facing integrations. Embedded integration platform as a service (iPaaS) is a low-code tool.
 33 | 
 34 | With Merge, you only need to build once. Merge also offers the same depth of data extensibility as an embedded iPaaS.

 71 | **Field mapping** \\
 72 | \\
 73 | You and your customers can map custom and standard third-party fields into standard fields you create](https://docs.merge.dev/guides/field-mappings/overview/) [![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67bb2d12c62011c3b5ead7f2_easy%20onboarding%20(7).svg)\\

 75 | \\
 76 | Get rich metadata for fields not mapped by Merge. When supported, write custom data back.](https://help.merge.dev/en/articles/7940316-remote-fields-overview)

In addition, Merge offers customers control over where their data is stored.

 28 | Merge vs. Paragon
 29 | 
 30 | # Build once with Merge or build 200+ times with Paragon
 31 | 
 32 | ‍

 34 | - With Merge’s Unified API, build just once to add 200+ product integrations; Paragon requires you to build each one separately
 35 | - Paragon places more burden on your engineers while Merge handles both maintenance and observability
 36 | - Access any data you need — Merge offers deeper data customization and extensibility than Paragon
 37 | 
 38 | [Get a demo](https://www.merge.dev/get-in-touch?utm_btn=dr-page-vs%2Fparagon)

 42 | ## 01
 43 | 
 44 | ### Paragon doesn’t solve the pain of building and maintaining every integration – Merge does
 45 | 
 46 | Paragon’s embedded iPaaS is unscalable; it requires you to individually build and maintain integrations for every single platform in their rigid, non-developer friendly tool.
 47 | 
 48 | With Merge, instantly scale your product integrations by accessing 200+ integrations across 6 key categories including HRIS, ticketing, and accounting.
 49 |

 51 | 
 52 | Build once to a Unified API
 53 | 
 54 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67bb2c369ce5a689dcd76d03_paragon-1-1.svg)

 60 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67bb2c6bcabf6acfef322b70_paragon-1-2.svg)
 61 | 
 62 | ## 02
 63 | 
 64 | ### Merge supports the entire integration lifecycle while Paragon puts the burden on you
 65 | 
 66 | Merge maintains integrations, so you don't have to. Merge also offers observability tools like searchable logs and automated issue detection, enabling your support team to proactively resolve errors.
 67 | 
 68 | Paragon requires your engineering teams to monitor third-party API changes and to implement logic to catch and debug any issues.
 69 | 
 70 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67cb153d812b94278eef99d7_paragon03-vs.avif)
 71 | 
 72 | ## 03
 73 | 
 74 | ### Paragon claims customization, but Merge actually delivers deeper, more extensible data
 75 | 
 76 | Anything that’s possible by building natively is possible through Merge. Read and write any custom objects and fields outside of our Merge’s Common Models.
 77 | 
 78 | Paragon only allows you to map fields in their low-code platform and places the responsibility on your customers; with Merge you have the flexibility to do it programmatically or in our dashboard.
 79 | 
 80 | [![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67bb2d136caa4ca3b287376f_easy%20onboarding%20(4).svg)\\

 88 | \\
 89 | You or your customer can map custom fields to Merge data models. Available via UI or API](https://docs.merge.dev/supplemental-data/field-mappings/overview/) [![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67bb2d12c62011c3b5ead7f2_easy%20onboarding%20(7).svg)\\

 28 | Merge vs. Rutter
 29 | 
 30 | # Merge is the only enterprise-ready accounting Unified API
 31 | 
 32 | ‍
 33 | 
 34 | - Rutter's async POST requests delay data reconciliation and are error-prone, while Merge syncs instantly when you write data
 35 | - Merge is built for enterprise needs; Rutter is unable to handle large syncs and has limited custom data support
 36 | - Recognized by G2 for best-in-class implementation and support, Merge is your trusted integration partner
 37 | 
 38 | [Get a demo](https://www.merge.dev/get-in-touch?utm_btn=dr-page-vs%2Frutter)
 39 | 
 40 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67adbc2b6979f65a411865f4_6bc233d732aef0c9f8273f2d5438befd_about_hero_bg-min.png)
 41 | 
 42 | ## 01
 43 | 
 44 | ### Skip the wait when writing data — Merge processes your POST requests synchronously
 45 | 
 46 | Rutter batches POST requests async without notifying you when they will actually occur, leaving you and your customers waiting for data. These async calls are extremely error-prone, requiring idempotency and heavy infrastructure builds to determine if writes succeed.
 47 | 
 48 | Merge's architecture is fundamentally different, with immediate syncs when you need to write data. Merge is built for real-time use cases, never waiting to process your POST requests.
 49 | 
 50 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67bb237bf0cc6a61d5bbf8fe_rutter-1.svg)
 51 | 
 52 | ## 02
 53 | 
 54 | ### Don’t limit yourself — choose Merge for enterprise scale and custom data support
 55 | 
 56 | Rutter breaks when syncing large enterprise accounts like NetSuite and lacks basic accounting features like general ledger transaction data. Rutter also has minimal support for custom fields.
 57 | 
 58 | Merge is built for enterprise: high quality, stable integrations with deeper accounting and custom field coverage.
 59 | 
 60 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67bb23b73ef9704372416820_rutter-2.svg)
 61 | 
 62 | ## 03
 63 | 
 64 | ### Rutter is an unproven tool. Merge is your long-term partner, with superior support and implementation.
 65 | 
 66 | From implementation to adoption, Merge prioritizes the highest quality of customer support and success. With 100+ G2 reviews from highly satisfied customers, our track record speaks for itself.
 67 | 
 68 | At a quarter of Merge's size, Rutter lacks the resources needed to support you, your integrations, and your customers.
 69 | 
 70 | ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624b192df0b0151225c10026/67b5d540e9d433286bb39700_apideck_1.svg)
